messages.subject: Unschooling Conference
messages.msgSnippet: Hello everyone, Is there anybody who is interested in the Live and Learn conference and has not registered yet?  I just received an invitation to a wedding on
messages.messageBody:
Hello everyone,

Is there anybody who is interested in the Live and Learn conference
and has not registered yet? I just received an invitation to a
wedding on Sept. 23 that requires an airline ticket and I can't afford
to do both. Since the Live and Learn conference is none refundable, I
was wondering if any of you who would like to go would like to
purchase mine. The registration would just get passed to you. I've
paid for (2) adult registration(3) Banquet, Dinner Show, Dance. Our
children are 3 and younger. It would be $285.
If you have any interest, please let me know.

Shannon

messages.subject: Re: Unschooling Conference
messages.msgSnippet: We need to have a Canadian version of an unschooling conference..that would be great. I think were going to make the trek though next year....but still wouldnt
messages.messageBody:
We need to have a Canadian version of an unschooling conference..that
would be great. I think were going to make the trek though next
year....but still wouldnt it be great? any other Canadians feel the
love?
lol

P

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Unschooling Conference
messages.msgSnippet: ... From: Lesa McMahon-Lowe lesajm@hotmail.com Is the unschooling conference already on the schedule for next year?  I d love more information.  I live in
messages.messageBody:
-----Original Message-----
From: Lesa McMahon-Lowe lesajm@...

Is the unschooling conference already on the schedule for next year? I'd
love more information. I live in central IL so the drive to St. Louis is
only about 2 hours or so.

-=-=-=-

Bummer, Lesa. The conference is a travelling show now. We're in Albuquerque, NM in 2006!

~Kelly

Kelly Lovejoy
Conference Coordinator
Live and Learn Unschooling Conference
http://liveandlearnconference.org
